          <title>
            <string language="et">Numbrid 1-5</string>
            <string language="en">Numbers from 1 to 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen von 1 bis 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nombres de 1 à 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números de 1 a 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri da 1 a 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμοί από 1 έως 5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Números a partir de la 1 a 5</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">PowerPoint esitluse abil saab õpetada lastele numbreid 1-5ni ja loendamist viie piiris.</string>
            <string language="en">With the help of PowerPoint presentation children learn numbers 1-5 and counting up to 5.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Matemaatika</string>
            <string language="et">Arvude</string>
            <string language="et">suuruste ja kujundite tundmaõppimine</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Hilfe der PowerPoint Darstellung erlernen 
Kinder Zahlen 1-5 und Zählen bis 5.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avec l'aide de la présentation de PowerPoint les 
enfants apprennent des numéros 1-5 et compte jusqu'à de 5.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com a ajuda da apresentação de PowerPoint as 
crianças aprendem números 1-5 e contagem de até 5.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con l'aiuto della presentazione del PowerPoint i 
bambini imparano i numeri 1-5 e contare fino a 5.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τη βοήθεια της παρουσίασης PowerPoint τα παιδιά 
μαθαίνουν τους αριθμούς 1-5 και υπολογισμός μέχρι 5.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con la ayuda de la presentación de PowerPoint los
niños aprenden números 1-5 y cuenta de hasta 5.</string>
          </description>
